title: Why does every syndra I vs suck.
body:
and when I say suck, I mean waste all of their mana clearing the minion wave or trying to harass me until they are oom and just recall.

this even happens when I'm not in lane.

and I promise you I'm not exaggerating.

like I would understand if this happens every now and then but this happens EVERY SINGLE GAME vs agaisnt syndra.

I rarely ever see this behaviour on any other champion, just syndra.

EDIT: IM NOT QUESTIONING HER POWER AND I DONT CARE HOW OUT OF META SHE IS OR HOW HIGH SKILL CAPPED SHE IS ITS JUST WHY DOES EVERY SYNDRA I VS WASTE THEIR MANA FOR NO REASON.

replies.body: People get waveclear and last hit confused.
Syndra sucks so hard right now. One of those champs that you can play really well and still not have as much of an impact as other mid laners would.

You didn't understand the post.

I don't care how much they suck or how out of meta they are, I meant why does every syndra I vs waste all their mana on minions and me until they are oom and then still stay in lane.
They waste all their mana clearing waves because clearing waves is important and they waste all their mana trying to do so because **Syndra sucks right now**
Because, Syndra isn't in the meta and they arre probably silly Summoners like me and think mana isn't a thing.(I've been playing low mna required champions and champions with no mana)

You didn't understand the post.

I don't care how much they suck or how out of meta they are, I meant why does every syndra I vs waste all their mana on minions and me until they are oom and then still stay in lane.
Syndra doesn't have to be in the meta. It's just that she's a high skillcap champ anyway. Hard to play, hard to master.

Maybe they are just trolling. Like do they win the matches in the end, also do u pick champs that counter. Finally they might just be beginners or thats the way to play her. I dont really know but maybe ur just dodging her attacks
I play {{champion:55}} often in solo queue, so it's a little bit harder to abuse, but sometimes I play {{champion:84}} and its basically a free win.
if she has decent mana/regen then its fine....
They are probably riven mains xD
